title: Trevor Noah: Racism Detective - Steve King's White Supremacy Comments | Tressie McMillan Cottom
itunes:title: Trevor Noah: Racism Detective - Steve King's White Supremacy Comments | Tressie McMillan Cottom
description:
Trevor investigates Congressman Steve King's racist comments, Ronny Chieng gives his take on the 2019 Consumer Electronics Show, and Tressie McMillan Cottom discusses "Thick."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
